name: A hearty haven
description: This Valentine's Day, shower your special someone with love by gifting them CocoCart's Hearty Haven! This hamper contains 1 Whittaker's White Bar 50g, 1 Godiva Signature Dark Roastd Almond 90, 1 Milka Strawberry Milk Chocolate Bar 100g, 1 Ritter Sport Peppermint Bar 100g & 1 E Wedel Fruit Drops Hard Candies 90g

name: After Eight Mini Snack Bag 150g
description: 150g of delicate dark and milk chocolates, filled with mint cream – the ideal treat to carry around with you and indulge!

name: After Eight Mint Chocolate Thins Box 200g
description: An elegant box containing 200g of individually wrapped wafer-thin mints of the number one after-dinner mint in the world – to share without moderation. Also, these mint chocolates are the perfect combination of rich chocolate and mint, which can be savoured as they are, or can be added to desserts.

name: After Eight Strawberry Mint Chocolate  Thins Box 200g
description: Enjoy sharing these After Eight® after dinner mints with a twist. Each After Eight® chocolate thin has a Strawberry and mint-flavored creamy fondant centre enrobed in delicate dark chocolate. This sophisticated gift box of 24 chocolates has a first class feeling.

name: Anthon Berg Dark 66% Bar 80g
description: Fruity-Floral Notes, Delicate Cocoa Acidity and Elegant Bitter Shades combine to create a stimulating Chocolate Experience.

name: Anthon Berg Extra Dark 77% Bar 80g
description: Definite, Bitter-Fruity Cocoa Notes with Fine Acidity and Touches of Orange and Spicy Smoke.

name: Arabian Delights Assorted Box 300g
description: Arabian Delicacy : Indulge in happiness with every bite you take! Arabian Delights centre-filled chocodates have the decadence you would love in finger food snacks. These bite-sized snacks are sure to awaken your taste buds. Quality Ingredients: These chocolate-coated delights are made using high-quality ingredients, from pure white and dark chocolate to premium dates and roasted almonds. Bite-Sized Snacks: These irresistible bite-sized almond and date-stuffed chocolates are all covered in chocolate that keeps them soft, and moist on the inside. The crunch from the almonds and smoothness of the dates are retained perfectly.. Health Benefits: The delectable Arabian Delight chocolates offer a plethora of nutritional benefits. With the appetizing flavour, these chocodates are full of natural sweetness to satisfy your cravings.

name: Arabian Delights Assorted Premium Dates 160g
description: Arabian Delicacy : Indulge in happiness with every bite you take! Arabian Delights centre-filled chocodates have the decadence you would love in finger food snacks. These bite-sized snacks are sure to awaken your taste buds. Quality Ingredients: These chocolate-coated delights are made using high-quality ingredients, from pure white and dark chocolate to premium dates and roasted almonds. Bite-Sized Snacks: These irresistible bite-sized almond and date-stuffed chocolates are all covered in chocolate that keeps them soft, and moist on the inside. With the appetizing flavour, these chocodates are full of natural sweetness to satisfy your cravings.

name: Better Half
description: This Valentine's Day, make your special someone smile from ear-to-ear with CocoCart's Heart Throb gift box!This hamper contains 1 E Wedel Milk Chocolate With Blueberry & Wild Strawberry Filling Bar 100g, 1 Godiva Milk Chocolate Bar 90g, 1 Cadbury Dairy Milk Bar 200g, 1 Kit Kat Chunky White 40g, 1 Hershey's Reese's Peanut Butter Cup 42g & 1 Lindt Excellence Mild 70% 100g

name: Bounty Minis 250g
description: Bounty Milk Chocolate is a much-loved chocolate bar that is made with moist tender coconut and covered with a thick, smooth chocolate layer. The Bounty Mini Bag is a collection of original bounty bars, which are individually wrapped and packaged in an easy-to-carry pouch.

name: Build your own Blush Pink Trunk
description: Our Chocolates, Your Curation! Curate a very special gift hamper with CocoCart's Blush Pink Trunk! Simply add your favourite chocolates to your cart along with the Blush Pink Trunk & our gifting specialists will pack it for delivery! Dimension : 13x8x5 inches (L x W x D)  Please note : This trunk does not contain any chocolate.

name: Build your own Mini Blush Pink Trunk
description: Our Chocolates, Your Curation! Curate a very special gift hamper with CocoCart's Mini Blush Pink Trunk! Simply add your favourite chocolates to your cart along with the Mini Blush Pink Trunk & our gifting specialists will pack it for delivery! Dimension : 28x20x11.5 cm (L x W x D)  Please note : This trunk does not contain any chocolate.

name: Build your own Trunk
description: Our Chocolates, Your Curation! Curate a very special gift hamper with CocoCart's Trunk! Simply add your favourite chocolates to your cart along with the CocoCart Trunk & our gifting specialists will pack it for delivery! Dimension : 13x8x5 inches (L x W x D)  Please note : This trunk does not contain any chocolate.

name: Cadbury Biscuits Nibbly Fingers Pouch 320g
description: The Cadbury Nibbly Fingers pouch contains eight bags of crisp mini-biscuits, dipped in Cadbury Dairy Milk chocolate. The small bags make for the perfect snack on the go and for sharing with friends and family.
origin: Country of Origin - UNITED KINGDOM OF GREAT BRITAIN AND NORTHERN IRELAND

name: Cadbury Crunchie Rocks Bag 110g
description: Clusters of milk chocolate with cornflakes and honeycombed pieces. Crispy Crunchie honeycomb pieces and golden cornflakes tumbled in Cadbury milk chocolate. Ideal for sharing with family and friends.

name: Cadbury Dairy Milk Bar 200g
description: Cadbury’s deliciously creamy milk chocolate is made with a Glass and a Half of fresh milk. With fairtrade cocoa and sugar, this large 200g bar is perfect for sharing with the whole family.

name: Cadbury Dairy Milk Caramel Chunks Pouch 300g
description: A pouch filled with Cadbury Dairy Milk individually-wrapped miniature bites with a soft Caramel center. It comes in a large sharing pouch, ideal for sharing with friends and family.

name: Cadbury Dairy Milk Chocolate Bar 180g
description: Cadbury’s deliciously creamy milk chocolate is made with a Glass and a Half of fresh milk. With fairtrade cocoa and sugar, this large 200g bar is perfect for sharing with the whole family.

name: Cadbury Dairy Milk Chocolate Minis Bags 120g
description: Cadbury dairy milk chocolate is for those everyday moments of joy that you want to share with your near and dear ones with something sweet.

name: Cadbury Dairy Milk Chocolate With Oreo Bar 120g
description: Yummy Cadbury Dairy Milk chocolate with a creamy vanilla filling and Oreo biscuit pieces.

name: Cadbury Dairy Milk Chocolate With Whole Nuts Bar 180g
description: Delicious Cadbury Dairy Milk chocolate with hazelnuts.

name: Cadbury Dairy Milk Fruit and Nut Bar 200g
description: The Cadbury Dairy Milk Fruit and Nut Bar bring 200g of creamy milk chocolate together with dried grapes, chopped almonds, and nuts.

name: Cadbury Dark Milk Buttons Pouch 105g
description: Deliciously simple and simply delicious! When an abundance of rich cocoa is brought together with Cadbury creaminess a whole new world of chocolate is created. Welcome to Cadbury Darkmilk Giant Buttons.

name: Cadbury Flake 4-pack Pouch 80g
description: This decadent Cadbury Flake bar is made from the crumbliest, flakiest chocolate, for a delicate melt-in-the-mouth texture. Each pack contains 4 bars, ideal for an afternoon treat and for that sweet chocolate escape at work, home or on the go.

name: Cadbury Twirl 5-pack Pouch 107.5g
description: Twirly milk chocolate fingers covered in smooth Cadbury milk chocolate. Each pack contains 5 tasty single bars - ideal for an afternoon treat and for that sweet chocolate escape at work, home or on the go. Terrifically twirly and scrumptiously swirly, milk chocolate bites of Cadbury Twirl - made to make mouths water.

name: Chocodate Exclusive Dark No Added Sugar Pouch 250g
description: Chocodate is an exquisite bite sized delicacy made with 3 simple ingredients including rich silky chocolate, velvety Arabian date and filled with a golden roasted almond.

name: ChocoDate Exclusive Real Assorted Pouch 250g
description: Chocodate is an exquisite bite-sized delicacy made with 3 simple ingredients including rich silky chocolate, velvety Arabian date and filled with a golden roasted almond.

name: Chocodate Exclusive Real Extra Dark Pouch 100g
description: The Chocodate Pouch is created for those who love chocolate in all flavors and colors. Indulge in the lucious playfulness of the Chocodate and relish the taste of the decadent extra dark chocolate Chocodate.

name: Chocodate Exclusive Real Milk Box 250g
description: The Chocodate Box is created for those who love chocolate in all flavors and colors. Indulge in the light playfulness of the Chocodate and relish the taste of the silky smooth milk chocolate Chocodate.

description: The Chocodate Pouch is created for those who love chocolate in all flavors and colors. Indulge in the light playfulness of the Chocodate and relish the taste of the silky smooth milk chocolate Chocodate.

description: The Chocodate Box is created for those who love chocolate in all flavors and colors. Indulge in the lucious playfulness of the Chocodate and relish the taste of the decadent extra dark chocolate Chocodate.

name: Chokola 35% Classic Smooth Bar 80g
description: A quintessential gifting proposition for your family, friends, and loved ones Classic Milk Bar is an appetizing. Handmade to perfection with utmost care and hygiene to ensure nothing but the authentic taste of a milk chocolate is intact, the classic milk bar on a bargain price is a steal deal for classic milk chocolate lovers. The Classic Milk Bar comes wrapped in a beauteous packing that expresses sheer warmth and care.

name: Classic Gift Bag
description: Gift Bag will be packed separately along with your order. You would have to pack the product in the bag yourself. This is so that the gift bag and product do not get damaged or creased during delivery as it gets delivered in a cold storage box with a plastic covering. Color would be either brown or gold.

name: Coco's Premium Opulence
description: This hamper contains 1 Villars Swiss Game Mini Swiss Milk Chocolates Case 250g, 1 Godiva Prestige Milk Biscuit 12pc 100g, 1 Elvan Jelaxy Bear Jellies Bag 130G, 1 Whittaker's Mini Coconut Slabs 180g, 1 E Wedel Praline Coffee Box 100g, 1 Jules Destrooper Belgian Chocolate Thins 100g, 1 St Michel Mini Chocolate Chip Madeleines 175g, 1 Cadbury Bubbly Milk Chocolate Minis Bags 108g, 1 Godiva Dark Blood Orange Bar 90g, 1 E Wedel Dark Chocolate With Panna Cotta Filling 100g, 1 Valrhona Tulakalum 75% Cocoa Bar 70g, 1 Neuhaus Milk 35% Cococa 100g Bar, 1 Kit Kat Choco Caramel Crispy Bar 120g & 1 After Eight Mint Chocolate Thins Box 200g
